heading: Digital Channels
subHeading: Visualising our products within the DWP strategy for 2030
description: Digital Channels is delivering many of the building blocks that will enable DWP's 2030 strategy - products, features and components that only realise their full value when joined together as complete services and activities.

instructions.steps1: Use the Strategy Drivers to see how services and products connect to the DWP 2030 Vision.

instructions.steps2: Explore by Outcome View to see how services and activities contribute to the outcomes we're aiming for.

instructions.steps3: Switch to Product View to locate specific products in context.

callToActions.description: The strategic drivers that show how our work connects to the wider 2030 vision.
The outcomes delivered shown through an enterprise view of services and activities.
The products, components and enablers - building blocks for joined-up services.
